attributes.action: End all tax-payer payments to the Royal family
attributes.background: Considering the financial state of the UK and with costs being cut left, right and centre is it perhaps time we cut one of the largest expenses? The Queen receives a HUGE payment from the tax payers of the United Kingdom on top of profits made from her own private lands. Both in the millions.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Sovereign Grant is fixed at a percentage of the income from the Crown Estate so is already self-funded.

You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/sovereign-grant-act-2011-guidance/sovereign-grant-act-2011-guidance

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name in order to start a new petition.
